dcterms:creator: Alex Krizhevsky
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 60,000 32x32 color images in 10 classes, with 6,000 images per class. The dataset is commonly used for evaluating machine learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10

dcterms:creator: Alex Krizhevsky
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 60,000 32x32 color images in 100 classes, with 600 images per class. It is used for evaluating machine learning algorithms, particularly in the context of fine-grained classification.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-100

dcterms:creator: Tong Xiao
Tian Xia
Yi Yang
Chang Huang
Xiaogang Wang
dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset containing 1 million images of clothing obtained from online shopping websites, classified into 14 categories. The labels are generated from surrounding texts and contain many errors.
dcterms:title: Clothing1M
